title: Whispering Vine Wine Co. Tasting
description:
Join us on Wednesday, February 25, from 4–7 PM at Whispering Vine South Creek for a special tasting featuring our very own Whispering Vine Wine Co. lineup. This is your chance to explore the house favorites that deliver quality, versatility, and incredible value across a range of styles.

Tasting Fee: $15 (Buy a bottle from the tasting and your fee is refunded)

Featured Wines:

• Whispering Vine Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 – Silky and refined with crushed raspberry, peppery herbs, subtle white smoke, and gently grippy tannins.

• Whispering Vine Pinot Noir 2023 – Bright and lively with tart cherry, strawberry, cranberry, cola, and baking spice.

• Whispering Vine Chardonnay 2023 – Fresh and balanced with tropical fruit, white peach, Meyer lemon, and crisp minerality.

• Whispering Vine Pinot Gris 2023 – Juicy and refreshing with honeysuckle, green apple, lemon zest, lychee, and a clean mineral finish.

• Whispering Vine Rosé 2022 – Crisp and vibrant with orange blossom, strawberry, watermelon, and bright citrus lift.

Discover your new go-to bottle from the Whispering Vine collection—buy a bottle and your tasting is free.
